points.3: Get access to advanced trading features

1.title: A Multi-portfolio Tracker
1.sub: Track every asset you have from one dashboard.
1.content: Arya Crypto is a one-stop-shop to track the prices and performance of your all your crypto assets, across your different wallets and exchanges.

2.title: Smart Allocation: One-click investing
2.sub: Buy a basket of your favourite crypto currencies in one click.
2.content: Create the perfect portfolio, buy it in one-click, and enhance your strategy through backtesting and setting performance-based exits.

3.title: Maximise your Trading Profits
3.sub: Transform your manual work into automated actions.
3.content: With the Trading feature, taking positions, placing your stop losses and taking profits has never been easier. Control and automate your trading profits while securing your capital.

1.Q: Is ARYA Crypto suitable for all levels of expertise?
1.A: Yes, all levels from beginner onwards.

2.Q: Can I use an existing cryptocurrency wallet?
2.A: Yes, as long as your wallet is on Binance or Coinbase. ARYA Crypto will track your wallet and allow you to manage your wallet with ease.

3.Q: Which broker(s) is ARYA Crypto compatible with?
3.A: ARYA Crypto is compatible with Binance and Coinbase.

4.Q: What is the choice of cryptocurrencies available on the platform?
4.A: Find all the cryptocurrencies available at Binance on the ARYA Crypto platform.
